channel.title: Comments on: How to Install KOHA on Ubuntu 20.04

item.title: By: AOMIE
item.dc:creator: AOMIE
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://netmiko.com/install-koha-on-ubuntu-linux/#comment-606">Paul</a>.
Hi, yes you can share koha via lan or webhost. You can host koha on cloud if you want anyone from anywhere to use it. Or if you want local users that are connected to the same network to be able to use it then you can also do that.
The articles given below will help you -
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/11820777/access-koha-staff-opac-client-over-lan-network https://wiki.koha-community.org/wiki/How_to_set_up_a_domain_name_for_Koha https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aaLHrX1fdL8
